original_title: Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds: International Magic Live At The O2
overview: International Magic Live at The O2 is the debut video album by English rock band Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds. Released on 13 October 2012, the album documents the band's performance at The O2 Arena in London on 26 February 2012, as part of their High Flying Birds Tour.
tagline: Faster than the speed of magic...
title: Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds: International Magic Live At The O2
